DOCNAME: CASE OF BADRETDINOV AND OTHERS v. RUSSIA
CONCLUSION: Violation of Article 3 - Prohibition of torture (Article 3 - Degrading treatment;Inhuman treatment) (Substantive aspect)
TEXT: CARDINAL . All the applicants were convicted by NORP courts and given custodial sentences .
CARDINAL . They served their sentences in penitentiary facilities which were overcrowded and suffered from a shortage of sanitary installations .
